SELECT * FROM ( SELECT @NO := @NO + 1 AS ROWNO, MSGID, MSGCTNT FROM $schemaId$.TSEAIEA11, (SELECT @NO := 0) R
UPPER(MSGID) LIKE CONCAT( '%' , #searchMsg# , '%' )
ORDER BY MSGID ) ORGTABLE WHERE ROWNO BETWEEN #startNum# AND #endNum#

SELECT COUNT(*) AS TOTALCOUNT FROM $schemaId$.TSEAIEA11
UPPER(MSGID) LIKE CONCAT( '%' , #searchMsg# , '%' )
